channel.title: Buffer Overflow on Kenny Nguyen (momo)
channel.description: Recent content in Buffer Overflow on Kenny Nguyen (momo)

item.title: Lame ZeroDay Research: Stack Based Buffer Overflow in CVE-2024-XYZA
item.description: TLDR Checkout https://github.com/momo1239 for proof of concept inputs. CVE-2024-XYZA A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the charset handling functionality of html2xhtml version 1.3. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability by providing a specially crafted input, which would lead to the overflow of the ‘buf’ variable located on the stack. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code or crash the application, leading to denial of service.
